snippet.title: Hylics 2 Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Hylics 2 is a recreational program with light JRPG elements. The sequel to Hylics, it features greatly improved character movement and animation, as well as 3D environments derived from scanned clay models.
Its projected release window is Summer 2019. It will be playable on Windows and Mac computers.

Donations to support this project are accepted at:
https://www.gofundme.com/hylics-2-development-fund
